item.title: Gaza peace plan explained: What to know after Hamas welcomes US plan for Gaza
item.description: <p>Both Israel and now Hamas have signaled support for the new U.S. plan to end the war in Gaza and release all remaining hostages there.</p>

item.title: WA police seize 135 guns in raids targeting 'sovereign citizens'
item.description: <p>P﻿olice say the call to action came after the fatal Porepunkah police shootings in August.</p>

item.title: Police investigating 'suspicious' death of 84-year-old woman in western Sydney
item.description: <p>The 84-year-old was located with injuries to her upper body, but said it was too early to say what could have caused these injuries.</p>

item.title: Lithium-ion batteries spark house fire in Melbourne's north-east
item.description: <p>A﻿ family of four has had a lucky escape after lithium-ion batteries sparked a horror blaze at their home in Melbourne&#x27;s north-east.</p>

item.title: Girl, 6, fighting for life after horror Adelaide crash
item.description: <p>Police responded to reports ﻿of a collision between two Toyotas at the intersection of King Road and Penfield Road in Virginia about 11am.</p>

item.title: More than a dozen injured in Croydon Park shooting, man arrested
item.description: <p>A 60-year-old man has been arrested after more than a dozen people were injured in a shooting incident Sydney&#x27;s inner west.</p>
